history.content:
If you're trying to improve your internship/job search definitely taking CS 170 as soon as possible would be ideal as algorithms/design-oriented thinking are common in interviews. If you're not sure you can handle the workload of CS 61C + CS 170, perhaps delaying CS 61C would be a better choice.

I'm a CS Peer Advisor, so feel free to stop by HP Auditorium M/W 2-4 PM to chat more about this!

=========

Agree that 170 is much more important for interviews, unless you know you're doing something specific that 61C needs.

If you're trying to improve your internship/job search definitely taking CS 170 as soon as possible would be ideal as algorithms/design-oriented thinking are common in interviews. If you're not sure you can handle the workload of CS 61C + CS 170, perhaps delaying CS 61C would be a better choice.

I'm a CS Peer Advisor, so feel free to stop by HP Auditorium M/W 2-4 PM to chat more about this!
Which one should I take first? I would like to take one along with CS 61C next fall.
history.subject: CS 170 VS CS 168
